column7: Intensive laboratory approach to the development of advanced techniques necessary for working effectively with choral ensembles. 2 graduate hours. No professional credit. May be repeated in separate terms to a maximum of 8 hours. Prerequisite: MM choral conducting students or consent of instructor.
